longBusinessSummary: Hokuriku Electrical Construction Co.,Ltd. engages in the construction business in Japan. The company undertakes electrical, plumbing, civil engineering, steel structure, pavement, and telecommunications works. It also undertakes water supply facility, painting, scaffolding and earthwork, and firefighting facility works. In addition, the company sells, leases, and manages real estate properties. Hokuriku Electrical Construction Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1944 and is headquartered in Toyama, Japan.
